item.title: 俄罗斯原油运输反弹，即使制裁扣押了油轮
item.description:
油轮禁令正在使某些流动变得复杂，但尚未影响总体出口水平

。【原文：

Tanker bans are complicating some flows without yet hitting overall export levels

】

item.title: 对冲基金 Gemcorp 在阿布扎比设立办事处推进私人信贷业务
item.description: 总部位于伦敦的对冲基金 Gemcorp Capital 希望今年晚些时候在阿布扎比增设一个交易办事处。【原文：London-based hedge fund Gemcorp Capital is looking to add a trading office in Abu Dhabi later this year.】

item.title: 拉里-芬克呼吁潮一代解决 "退休危机
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.首席执行官拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）警告说，美国正面临一场迫在眉睫的 "退休危机"，并呼吁婴儿潮一代帮助年轻一代为自己的未来储蓄足够的资金。【原文：BlackRock Inc. Chief Executive Officer Larry Fink warned of a looming “retirement crisis” facing the US and called on baby boomers to help younger generations save enough for their own futures.】

item.title: 巨额交易卷土重来，推动 6,600 亿美元并购案复兴
item.description: 大量巨额交易推动了并购活动的反弹，使投资银行家们在经历了两年的低迷活动后得到了一些亟需的缓解。【原文：A rush of megadeals is powering a rebound in mergers and acquisitions, bringing some much-needed relief for investment bankers after two years of subdued activity.】

item.title: 房地产蓬勃发展之际，迪拜考虑建筑公司 ALEC 的 IPO 事宜
item.description: 迪拜正在考虑对建筑公司 ALEC 进行首次公开募股，因为迪拜房地产市场的繁荣推动商业和住宅房地产价格接近创纪录的水平。【原文：Dubai is considering an initial public offering of construction firm ALEC amid a property boom in the emirate that’s pushed commercial and residential real estate prices close to record levels.】

item.title: 可可升至 10,000 美元，短缺推动可可持续上涨
item.description: 可可在纽约攀升至前所未有的每吨 10,000 美元附近，因为全球可可短缺扰乱了市场，提高了巧克力的成本。【原文：Cocoa climbed near an unprecedented $10,000 a ton in New York as a global shortage rattles the market and raises the cost of chocolate.】

item.title: 欧洲央行穆勒称数据可能证实 6 月通胀放缓
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马迪斯-穆勒说，未来几周的数据可能足以在决策者于 6 月份确定借贷成本时证实通胀放缓。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Madis Muller said data over the coming weeks may be sufficient to confirm the slowdown in inflation by the time policymakers set borrowing costs in June.】

item.title: 老牌中国投资者押注美国遏制下中国仍能蓬勃发展
item.description: 尽管在许多西方人眼中，中国与美国之间的紧张关系使其失去了投资价值，但中国的长期投资者仍在押注中国有望恢复发展势头。【原文：Long-time China investors are betting the nation is poised to recover its momentum even as tensions with the US has left it uninvestable in the eyes of many in the West.】

item.title: 土耳其银行出售 AT1 债券作为应对里拉波动的缓冲手段
item.description: 土耳其银行正在成为附加一级债券的定期发行者，在全球信贷市场最炙手可热的一角，发行美元债券有助于保护银行免受里拉波动的影响。【原文：Turkish banks are becoming regular issuers of Additional Tier 1 bonds, raising dollar-debt that helps protect them against a volatile lira in one of the hottest corners of the global credit market.】

item.title: 英国合作银行在最新的成本削减行动中裁员 400 人
item.description: Co-Operative 银行正计划裁撤约 400 个职位，因为这家英国贷款机构正努力更多地依赖技术并削减成本。【原文：Co-Operative Bank is planning to eliminate about 400 roles amid the British lender’s ongoing efforts to rely more on technology and cut costs.】

item.title: 瑞典酒店向瑞典央行发出涨价警告信号
item.description: 在北欧最大经济体的利率准备开始下降之际，瑞典企业的定价计划略有上升，因为酒店和其他服务提供商表示他们计划提高价格。【原文：A gauge of Swedish businesses’ pricing plans rose slightly as hotels and other service providers indicated that they plan to increase prices just as interest rates in the biggest Nordic economy are poised to start falling.】

item.title: 英国央行行长曼称市场对英国今年降息次数的定价过高
item.description: 英国央行政策制定者凯瑟琳-曼（Catherine Mann）表示，金融市场对今年降息的定价过高，英国不太可能在美国联邦储备委员会之前采取行动。【原文：Bank of England policy maker Catherine Mann said financial markets are pricing in too many interest rate cuts this year and that it’s unlikely the UK will move before the US Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 巴尔的摩大桥在船只撞上立交桥后坍塌
item.description: 巴尔的摩的一座通勤桥在被一艘集装箱船撞击后坍塌，导致车辆坠入水中。【原文：A commuter bridge in Baltimore collapsed after being rammed by a container ship, causing vehicles to plunge into the water.】

item.title: 史密斯公司首席执行官保罗-基尔离职不到三年
item.description: 史密斯集团（Smiths Group Plc）首席执行官保罗-基尔（Paul Keel）在上任不到三年后将立即卸任。【原文：Smiths Group Plc Chief Executive Officer Paul Keel is stepping down with immediate effect after less than three years on the job.】

item.title: 纽约联储称中国制造业驱动美国通胀上升风险加大
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行的最新研究显示，中国在房地产低迷的情况下努力提振制造业和支撑经济，可能会给美国通胀带来 "有意义的上行压力"，并推后宽松货币政策的启动时间。【原文：China’s effort to boost manufacturing and shore up the economy amid a real estate slump could put “meaningful upward pressure” on US inflation and push back the start of monetary easing, according to new research by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.】

item.title: 特朗普社交媒体公司在SPAC协议后首次亮相前大涨
item.description: 前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体初创公司在经历了多年来最引人注目的空头支票交易之后，在其作为上市公司的首次会议之前正在崛起。【原文：Former president Donald Trump’s social media startup is rising ahead of its first session as a publicly traded company after the most high-profile blank-check deal in years.】

item.title: 利比亚石油部长乌恩停职接受调查
item.description: 据一家政府机构称，利比亚石油部长穆罕默德-乌恩（Mohamed Oun）已被停职，等待调查。【原文：Libyan Oil Minister Mohamed Oun has been suspended from office pending an investigation, according to a government agency.】

item.title: S.非洲法院驳回将祖马党从选票中除名的申请
item.description: 南非执政党非洲人国民大会（African National Congress）要求将其前领导人雅各布-祖马（Jacob Zuma）所支持的政党在 5 月选举前从选票中除名，但最终败诉。【原文：South Africa’s ruling African National Congress lost a bid to have the party endorsed by its former leader, Jacob Zuma, removed from the ballot before elections in May.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦为伊朗天然气管道寻求美国制裁豁免
item.description: 巴基斯坦计划请求美国放宽对邻国伊朗的天然气管道项目可能实施的制裁。【原文：Pakistan plans to ask the US to relax possible sanctions around a natural gas pipeline project from neighboring Iran.】

item.title: 凯雷称将考虑为印度 IT 企业 Hexaware 进行 10 亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. is considering options for Indian information technology firm Hexaware Technologies Ltd., including an initial public offering that could raise $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 韩华海洋称制裁使北极液化天然气船销售复杂化
item.description: 造船企业韩华海洋株式会社（Hanwha Ocean Co.【原文：Shipbuilder Hanwha Ocean Co. is facing difficulties in finding new buyers for specialized vessels built to serve a Russian liquefied natural gas facility that’s now subject to sanctions.】

item.title: 非洲被视为每晚 3000 美元酒店客房的增长热点
item.description: 随着非洲旅游业的蓬勃发展，包括万豪国际集团（Marriott International Inc.【原文：Major hotel chains including Marriott International Inc. and Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc. are on track to more than double their footprint across Africa in the coming years as the continent sees a boom in tourism.】

item.title: 澳大利亚顶级金矿商寻求扩建卡尔古利 "超级矿坑
item.description: Northern Star Resources Ltd. 正寻求扩建其位于西澳大利亚的旗舰项目 Fimiston 金矿，并将项目寿命延长至 2034 年。【原文：Northern Star Resources Ltd. is seeking to expand its flagship Fimiston gold mine in Western Australia and extend the life of the project to 2034.】

item.title: 阿斯特拉、辉瑞加大在华投资力度，尽管美国力促脱钩
item.description: 阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）和辉瑞公司（Pfizer Inc.【原文：The chief executive officers of AstraZeneca Plc and Pfizer Inc. pledged to support expansion of China’s biopharmaceutical industry, even as US politicians seek to decouple the tightly entwined supply chains that provide medicine to the world.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将在财报大潮中迎来第二个红盘日
item.description: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将在财报大潮中迎来第二个红盘日【原文：FTSE 100 Live: UK Stocks Set for Second Day in Red Amid Earnings Deluge】

item.title: 法国预算漏洞百出，马克龙战略成疑
item.description: 法国的预算赤字正逐渐脱离政府的控制，削弱了埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统作为能够解决国家财政难题的经济改革者的公信力。【原文：France’s budget deficit is slipping away from the government’s control, undermining President Emmanuel Macron’s credibility as an economic reformer capable of resolving the country’s fiscal challenges.】

item.title: 因警告恒大而被禁言的安德鲁-左现在要求道歉
item.description: 美国做空者安德鲁-勒夫（Andrew Left）希望香港市场监管机构道歉并退款。【原文：US short-seller Andrew Left wants an apology from Hong Kong’s market regulator — and a refund.】

item.title: 法国 2023 年赤字占产出的 5.5%，政府目标为 4.9
item.description: 法国的预算赤字正逐渐脱离政府的控制，削弱了埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统作为能够解决国家财政难题的经济改革者的公信力。【原文：France’s budget deficit is slipping away from the government’s control, undermining President Emmanuel Macron’s credibility as an economic reformer capable of resolving the country’s fiscal challenges.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事 欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 顶级 Pictet 基金经理认为生物技术股将加入人工智能热潮
item.description: 一位欧洲顶级基金经理表示，人工智能将帮助结束生物技术股多年来表现不佳的局面。【原文：Artificial intelligence is set to help bring years of biotech stock underperformance to an end, according to a top European fund manager.】
